text: He majhya janasamuhacya lokanno! Aja tara rajya tumace ahe ki tumhi ya dharativara varcasvasali ahata, parantu jara allahaca azaba (prakopa) amacyavara jhala tara kona amaci madata karela? Phira'auna mhanala ki mi tara tumhala toca salla deta ahe, je svatah pahata ahe ani mi tara tumhala bhala'icaca marga dakhavita ahe
